Define Documentation

#define ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_COUNT
Value:
((ZGP_MAX_TABLE_ENTRIES / ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_SIZE) + \
                                         ((ZGP_MAX_TABLE_ENTRIES % ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_SIZE)? 1:0))

#define ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_INFO_MASK_SIZE
Value:
(ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_COUNT/8 + \
                                          (ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_COUNT % 8 ? 1 : 0))
